attributes.action: clean up the content of the internet by law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make it unlawful for any website, or other area of the internet to contain any offensive matter or subject, or to contain any pornographic material, or promoting or describing methods of, acts of suicide, internet bullying, or methods of humiliaion, or containing foul language, or any matter considered offensive by any individual, or content considered to be libelous.
